name: mnemosyne
title: Mnemosyne
description: Quickly save URLs and notes to your Mnemosyne knowledge library
author: dort

commands.name: mneme
commands.title: Add Mneme
commands.description: Save a URL or title to your Mnemosyne library

commands.name: quick-mneme
commands.title: Quick Save from Clipboard
commands.description: Instantly save the URL in your clipboard

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
